Title*: Fair Isle Stripe Full-Zip Sherpa Fleece Jacket
Product description html:
Vintage Nordic Charm Meets Modern Comfort

This beautifully crafted sherpa fleece jacket brings the timeless appeal of Fair Isle patterns to contemporary outerwear. The horizontal stripe design features intricate geometric motifs in a warm palette of rusty orange, navy blue, and cream. Full-zip closure with stand collar provides versatile styling for any occasion.
Subtitle: Embrace timeless Nordic style with this Fair Isle stripe sherpa fleece jacket. Featuring classic geometric patterns in warm earth tones—rusty orange, navy blue, and cream—this full-zip jacket combines vintage aesthetics with modern comfort. Ideal for heritage-inspired collections and seasonal promotions.
Tags: fleece, Sherpa Fleece Jacket, Fair Isle Pattern, Nordic Print, Full Zip Jacket, Vintage Style, Winter Jacket, Women's Fleece
